text: int main ( ) { int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; int t , n , i , j , r , c , sum ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t > 0 ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; sum = 0 ; r = n - 2 ; c = 0 ; while ( r >= 0 ) { c = 0 ; while ( c <= r ) { if ( a [ r + 1 ] [ c ] > a [ r + 1 ] [ c + 1 ] ) a [ r ] [ c ] = a [ r + 1 ] [ c ] + a [ r ] [ c ] ; else a [ r ] [ c ] = a [ r ] [ c ] + a [ r + 1 ] [ c + 1 ] ; c ++ ; } r -- ; } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; t -- ; } return 0 ; }
